languages.text: {n}И его голос. Голос, рожденный в ядерной купели звезды и закаленный холодом межпланетной пустоты.{/n}
{n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}И его голос. Голос, рожденный в ядерной купели звезды и закаленный холодом межпланетной пустоты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear fount of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}

languages.text: {n}そして彼の声にも変化が見られる。星の核の泉で生まれた声は、惑星と惑星の間の虚空で冷え固められる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}そして彼の声にも変化が見られる。星の核の泉で生まれた声は、惑星と惑星の間の虚空で冷え固められる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}他的声音也不一样了。他的声音如今仿佛从恒星内核的喷发中诞生，而后于宇宙冰冷的虚空中硬化。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的声音也不一样了。他的声音如今仿佛从恒星内核的喷发中诞生，而后宇宙冰冷的虚空中硬化。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Quant à sa voix... Elle semble tout droit sortie du noyau d'une étoile après avoir été durcie dans le froid du vide intersidéral.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quant à sa voix... Elle semble tout droit sortie du noyau d'une étoile après avoir été durcie dans le froid du vide intersidéral.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Y su voz, nacida de la fuente nuclear de una estrella y fortalecida con el frío del vacío interplanetario.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Y su voz, nacida de la fuente nuclear de una estrella y fortalecida con el frío del vacío interplanetario.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Und seiner Stimme. Eine Stimme, die in der nuklearen Quelle eines Sterns geboren wurde und in der Kälte der interplanetaren Leere gehärtet wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Und seiner Stimme. Eine Stimme, die in der nuklearen Quelle eines Sterns geboren wurde und in der Kälte der interplanetaren Leere gehärtet wurde.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sesi de farklı. Güneşin nükleer çekirdeğinden doğup uzay boşluğunun soğuğunda katılaşmış bir ses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And his voice. A voice born in the nuclear font of a star and hardened in the cold of the interplanetary void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesi ve de. Bir güneşin nükleer çekirdeğinden doğmuş ve gezegenlerarası boşluğun soğuğunda katılaşmış bir ses.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
